programme.desc: Conclusion. The actor continues his journey, investigating the socio-economic and environmental pressures facing the Amazon, from oil demand to cocaine production

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The team's investigation into the death of a journalist leads them to discover a link between the victim and Koko Contee, a Congolese warlord believed to be dead. However, they soon encounter trouble when it transpires that the villain is very much alive. Meanwhile, Danny loses his cool after receiving text messages from Grace that were meant for someone else. Drama, guest starring Barkhad Abdi (Captain Phillips)

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The team welcomes the assistance of California special agent Kathy Milford (CSI: NY regular Melina Kanakaredes) as they set about tracking down an arsonist targeting couples. Meanwhile, Danno takes Amber on a romantic getaway, but things don't go quite to plan when her abusive ex-husband catches up with them

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Christmas isn't too merry for the NCIS team when they find themselves in the middle of a tricky investigation kick-started by a mysterious attack on a senator's daughter. Meanwhile, Kensi and Deeks are presented with the perfect holiday gifts from their colleagues. Michelle Trachtenberg (Buffy the Vampire Slayer) guest stars

programme.title: It's Me or the Dog
programme.desc: DJ `Diddy' David Hamilton receives help from animal behaviour expert Victoria Stilwell. His unhygienic Gordon setter Max is in desperate need of discipline to counteract its all-consuming obsession with bright lights, reflections and shiny objects

programme.title: It's Me or the Dog
programme.desc: Animal behaviour expert Victoria Stilwell visits the home of Rebecca Harris, whose Patterdale terrier has become over-possessive and refuses to let anyone else near her. Both owner and dog eat, sleep and go everywhere together and Rebecca's mum has reached breaking point with the pair

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Hananya's chimps are subdued when Cherri loses one of her newborn twins. Elsewhere, a fight breaks out at the lemur enclosure when two new arrivals are given a rough welcome

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison and wildlife vet John Lewis travel to Monkey World's sister sanctuary in Vietnam to release two golden-cheeked gibbons back into the wild

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.sub-title: Halloween 4: The Revenge of Rod Skyhook.
programme.desc: The Dunphys try to get Luke's Halloween party going, Cam confronts his Halloween nemesis and Jay plans to go to a party at an old enemy's home to deliver an unforgettable trick

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell is thrown into the spotlight when Cam fails to fill him in on what his play is really about, while Phil threatens to spoil Jay's favourite place in the world when he considers becoming a member

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Pritchett-Tuckers throw a huge Thanksgiving party and Cameron spares no expense, while Jay has to figure out a way to keep his blood pressure down on one of the most stressful days of the year. While Phil tries to get used to Rainer Shine dating his daughter, Hayley has to break it to her dad that she would rather spend the rest of her holiday with her new boyfriend than stay for the traditional family football game

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Hayley's plan for a fun-filled girl's day with Rainer Shine's teenage daughter may be a little more angst-filled than expected, while Luke finds himself in a compromising position with a widow at the club, and unwittingly helps Jay with his petition. At the Pritchett-Tucker home, Gloria, Phil and Cam have formed a secret alliance to ensure their respective mistakes are concealed from their spouses, but Mitchell starts suspecting something just isn't right

programme.title: Futurama
programme.sub-title: The Day the Earth Stood Stupid.
programme.desc: Earth is invaded by alien brains that have destroyed other planets and are intent on robbing all humans of their intellect. Leela informs Fry it is his job to save the day, since he is the only one immune to their enemy's powers

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: Dr Zoidberg persuades his long-lost uncle Harold Zoid to make a film, and Bender tricks Calculon into financing and starring in the production, promising him he is sure to win an Oscar. Unfortunately, it turns out to be a box-office flop

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Roma and Ronnie are shocked when a driver in Slough, Berkshire, records the highest reading they have ever seen in a breathalyser test, and Chris captures an innovative supermarket thief. The Liverpool Air Support Unit uses heat-sensing cameras to track down a criminal who has taken refuge underneath Blackpool pier

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Part two of two. Secret service agents Myka and Peter ease into their roles at Warehouse 13, discovering the treasures it holds, and meet Lena, the proprietor of a B&B near the base. Sci-fi drama, starring Eddie McClintock, Joanne Kelly and Saul Rubinek

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: An undercover operative is identified and killed by a local gang, who post the video of the murder online. It proves a stark warning for Callen and the team, who kickstart an operation to find whoever leaked the information before more agents' identities are compromised. Concern grows for Kensi in Afghanistan as she turns herself over to the insurgents in an attempt to find the White Ghost

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Eric is indulging his passion for computer gaming when he overhears his online friend being attacked. That's bad enough in itself, but this particular pal is a computer networking expert, raising suspicions that a system for controlling Russian missiles could be at risk. In Afghanistan, Kensi is surprised to be reunited with a familiar face from her past

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: A retired policeman is killed in a diamond robbery, and the vengeful team soon picks up a clue as one of the culprits has left behind a trail of blood. However, rather than make an immediate arrest, McGarrett and Danno stake out the robber's girlfriend, who was also involved in the crime, hoping to pick up both of them at the same time - and as the hours pass, it becomes clear the colleagues have a few issues to resolve. US crime drama, starring Alex O'Loughlin and Scott Caan. Directed by series star Daniel Dae Kim, who plays Chin Ho

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The agents race to Afghanistan to rescue Kensi from the clutches of the Taliban, hoping a grim photograph depicting their colleague as dead is a fake. An emotional Deeks is determined to squeeze information out of a blind Muslim cleric who has been visited by a Taliban courier - but how far will he go to find out what he needs? Meanwhile, the truth about the White Ghost operation is revealed

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The agents try to locate a former marine who has gone missing after embezzling money from Iraq and is now being targeted by al-Qaeda. Kensi is already back at work after her ordeal as a prisoner-of-war, although Hetty insists she should keep Eric company in the office, sending Nell to partner Deeks in the field

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The team's wormhole triggers an ecological disaster that threatens a friendly planet, and O'Neill discovers its usual guardians, the Asgard, are unable to help, as offering assistance would violate a treaty with the Goa'uld and jeopardise other protectorates. Sci-fi drama, starring Richard Dean Anderson

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish.
programme.desc: Mr Burns campaigns to become state governor in a desperate effort to avoid the attentions of the nuclear energy watchdog, but does not count on Homer's dubious assistance

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: Leela refuses to transport a consignment of hazardous cargo, so Professor Farnsworth puts Bender in command. However, he loses concentration and spills the shipment over a planet inhabited by penguins

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: Fry visits the ruins of Old New York to search for the seven-leaf clover that brought him good luck in the 20th century, and digs up his brother Yancy's grave to find it

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: An evening's car-crushing entertainment brings out the daredevil in Bart - who decides to try some death-defying stunts of his own, culminating in a skateboard jump over a gorge. Luckily, Homer is on hand to bring him down to earth

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge begins a crusade to clean up TV, convinced The Itchy & Scratchy Show is turning baby Maggie into a thug. The show's creators agree to make it less violent in future, but the move has a disastrous effect on its ratings

programme.sub-title: Bart Gets Hit by a Car.
programme.desc: When Bart is knocked down by Mr Burns' car, Homer and lawyer Lionel Hutz see a chance to take advantage of Springfield's richest man by making a lucrative compensation claim

programme.desc: Singer Nicole Scherzinger, Mighty Boosh star Noel Fielding and Wasps and England rugby union player James Haskell join captains Jamie Redknapp and Andrew Flintoff and regular panellist Jack Whitehall on the sports-based comedy quiz. James Corden asks the questions

Crime drama, starring Alex O'Quinn and Scott Caan, with a guest appearance from Terry O'Quinn(n)

programme.desc: In the orangutan nursery, all eyes are on Hsiao-quai, who the keepers hope will step up to the mark and adopt the orphaned baby Bulu, who has just arrived from Hungary(n)

programme.title: The British
programme.desc: The development of London during the Victorian era, as the city at the heart of the British empire rapidly expanded - and social divisions became increasingly pronounced. The programme explores the grandeur of the period, including the building of the Crystal Palace, as well as sharp rises in vice and crime that prompted outrage among reformers including Charles Dickens and Josephine Butler. There is also a look at how football became increasingly popular

programme.title: American Dad

programme.desc: Brenda and the team fear a gang war is about to break out when a 12-year-old boy is found murdered at a regular hangout before another two members are killed. Elsewhere, Fritz has a surprise in store for the detective. Crime drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Provenza's retired partner George Andrews returns to help the team when a case from seven years ago is reopened, but threatens to disrupt the investigation when he refuses to testify in the new trial. Detective drama series, guest starring Beau Bridges (My Name Is Earl)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Brennan takes on a challenging case when a lightning storm damages human remains found in a park. A locket helps identify the deceased as a 16-year-old professional gymnast, and Booth raises an eyebrow in the direction of her mathematician father, whose preoccupation with work doesn't seem natural for a man who just lost his daughter. Meanwhile, Cam comes face to face with her identity thief

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: NCIS

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a man who is murdered while taking photographs of the stars from his balcony. The main suspect is the woman with whom he was having an affair, but the case becomes complicated when the murder weapon cannot be found

programme.title: Bones

Meanwhile, Brennan makes a discovery about Wendell's health

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When the body of a widely disliked chess grandmaster is discovered in pig slop, Booth suspects a rival wanted to kill off the competition, and sends Sweets undercover among the professional players to try to uncover who wanted him dead. Meanwhile, Brennan is disappointed about the lack of options available to her as she looks to appoint an intern

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Incredible Ordeal of Norman Clegg.
programme.desc: Howard employs Clegg to take care of several suspect picnic objects, but one item receives his refusal and Howard will not look after it until Pearl is out of sight. Comedy, starring Peter Sallis and Robert Fyfe(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Wesley and Barry devise another money-making plan to sell hot dogs to weary hikers and travellers, while Clegg, Truly and Tom fondly remember Compo and imagine how Nora Batty's arrival in Australia will cause misery for the folks Down Under. Peter Sallis stars(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: In Search of Childlike Joy and the Farthest Reaches of the Lotus Position.
programme.desc: Wesley demonstrates his new hand-crafted trolley, complete with deluxe car seat - guaranteed to bring back childhood memories to the dispirited Smiler. Meanwhile, Barry gets into a tangle when he takes up yoga. Gordon Wharmby, Stephen Lewis and Mike Grady star(n)

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Social climber Hyacinth indulges another of her flamboyant whims and decides she and Richard need a new car - but a modest three-door hatchback is not what she had in mind. Comedy, starring Patricia Routledge and Clive Swift(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney's Christmas celebrations are disrupted by the unexpected arrival of their estranged father - leaving the brothers doubtful they can trust him after such a long absence. Another chance to see the 1983 festive special of John Sullivan's comedy(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The rundown state of the flats in Nelson Mandela House prompts Rodney to join the residents' committee, and he soon finds himself hobnobbing with council officials - a situation Del quickly exploits. Starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Basil's belief that guests are an obstacle to the smooth running of his hotel is borne out by the arrival of an aggressive woman (Joan Sanderson), and the tension between the two leads to a series of increasingly heated arguments. Classic comedy, starring John Cleese, Prunella Scales, Andrew Sachs and Connie Booth(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Prudish Basil resorts to increasingly desperate measures to prevent an unmarried couple lowering moral standards at his hotel. Unfortunately, as his efforts become increasingly frantic, he succeeds only in making a fool of himself. Classic comedy, starring John Cleese, Prunella Scales, Andrew Sachs and Connie Booth(n)

programme.title: Murder on the Blackpool Express
programme.desc: Comedy about a crime writer (Griff Rhys Jones) who takes a group of his fans on a coach tour of locations from his books. The bus is soon leaving a string of bodies in its wake, and the passengers are faced with the possibility of a murderer in their midst. With Johnny Vegas, Nigel Havers and Una Stubbs(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Lee Nelson, Stewart Francis and Paul Chowdhry.
programme.desc: Cheeky Londoner Lee Nelson plays host for a `well good' session of stand-up from the Hammersmith Apollo in London, warming up the audience before introducing routines by Canadian funnyman Stewart Francis and observational comic Paul Chowdhry(n)

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Mandy uses her feminine wiles to solve a severe cash-flow problem, Martin is still deeply in love with Clare, and Matthew takes up palmistry in a bid to impress the girls. Starring Matthew Cottle, Samantha Womack and Neil Stuke(n)

programme.title: Treasures of Heaven
programme.desc: Andrew Graham-Dixon discovers how some of Christianity's most important relics have been preserved, and explores the art of creating reliquaries - containers for storing sacred items. He learns why some believe such objects have the power to work miracles, and views three reliquaries that contain articles associated with the crucifixion of Jesus Christ. Featuring contributions by art historian Sister Wendy Beckett and Neil MacGregor of the British Museum

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1982
programme.desc: Tommy Vance introduces an episode from February 11, 1982, featuring performances by Fun Boy Three & Bananarama, the Stranglers, Bow Wow Wow, Adrian Gurvitz, Hall & Oates, Depeche Mode, the J Geils Band, Modern Romance, Haircut 100 and the Jam

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1982
programme.desc: Simon Bates hosts the March 11 edition, featuring Bow Wow Wow, Fun Boy Three and Bananarama, Depeche Mode, Julio Iglesias, Haircut 100, the Associates, Adrian Gurvitz and Tight Fit

programme.title: Modus
programme.desc: The police discover the results of the post-mortem on the body of artist Niclas Rosen, and with three seemingly unfathomable murders now part of the investigation, links slowly begin to emerge. Lennart Carlsson is taken in for questioning, and Inger Johanne is unsettled when she realises that she has seen him before. Meanwhile, a series of homophobic attacks take place across Stockholm. In Swedish

programme.title: Modus
programme.desc: The police begin to consider the prospect that the serial killer might have a homophobic agenda, and a chain of evidence leads to a group of fanatic American Christians, who take contracts out on homosexual targets. Meanwhile, Inger Johanne makes use of her FBI experience to make headway with the case. Swedish crime thriller, starring Melinda Kinnaman

programme.title: Beyond 100 Days
programme.desc: BBC News teams in Washington DC and London report on the events that are shaping the world

programme.title: Weather
programme.desc: No Details Available

programme.title: The Taff: The River That Made Wales
programme.desc: Writer and fisherman Will Millard reflects on how the waterway is now one of the finest trout and salmon rivers in Wales, having once ran black with coal dust. He meets the members of the Lewis Merthyr Colliery Brass Band and fishes for grayling with a former miner who is now a champion fly fisherman. Will also visits one of Britain's biggest open cast coal mines and sees how the landscape is now being re-claimed after centuries of mining

programme.title: Winter Olympics Extra
programme.desc: Radzi Chinyanganya presents action from day 11 in PyeongChang, South Korea, including the ice dance free programme in the figure skating, and ladies halfpipe freestyle skiing event

programme.title: PQ17: An Arctic Convoy Disaster
programme.desc: Between 1941 and 1945, merchant ships escorted by vessels from the US, Canadian and British navies delivered four million tons of essential goods to the Soviet Union. In this documentary, Jeremy Clarkson retraces the journey of the convoy of 35 ships codenamed PQ17 from Iceland to the Russian port of Arkhangelsk in June and July 1942, revealing how the Anglo-American mission became one of the biggest naval disasters of the 20th century. Featuring testimony from men who served on the vessels

programme.title: Byzantium: A Tale of Three Cities
programme.desc: Historian Simon Sebag Montefiore traces the sacred history of Istanbul. It was described as the `city of the world's desire', having been the focus of three faiths - Paganism, Christianity and Islam - and the stage for some of the fiercest political and religious conflicts over the past 2,500 years. Simon begins by uncovering its Greek roots and maps its transformation into the capital of the Roman Empire by Constantine the Great

programme.title: Dreaming the Impossible: Unbuilt Britain
programme.desc: Architectural investigator Dr Olivia Horsfall Turner reveals the fascinating and dramatic stories behind some of the grandest designs never built. She begins in 1855, when visionary designer Joseph Paxton put forward ambitious plans for the Great Victorian Way, which promised to alleviate congestion in London by encircling the city centre with a 10-mile-long glass structure containing shops, houses, hotels and eight railway lines

programme.title: Stories from the Dark Earth: Meet the Ancestors Revisited
programme.desc: Archaeologist Julian Richards revisits some of his most important digs to discover how science, conservation and new finds have changed people's understanding of ancient history. He concludes his journey at the excavations of two Anglo-Saxon cemeteries, where he explores the mystery of the Anglo-Saxon invasions that began after the fall of the Roman Empire, discovering fresh clues to some of the first pioneers at the burial site of a warrior and his horse. Last in the series

programme.title: Top of the Pops: 1982

programme.title: Modus

programme.title: The Taff: The River That Made Wales
programme.desc: Writer and fisherman Will Millard goes wild swimming with a group of eccentrics trying to change the image of the often forgotten waterway. He meets retired Somali sailors drawn to Cardiff in the city's glory days as a thriving port and tells the story of how the industrial docks have been transformed. Finally, he sets out to catch migratory salmon returning to the place where they were born. Last in the series

programme.title: Winter Olympics Extra
programme.desc: Radzi Chinyanganya presents action from day 12 in PyeongChang, South Korea, including the ladies singles short programme in the figure skating, and men's ski cross freestyle skiing

programme.title: Queen Victoria's Children
programme.desc: The concluding episode focuses on the monarch's sons, examining how they struggled to assert themselves in the shadow of their father. It explores Victoria's difficult relationships with the eldest, Bertie, whose sexual indiscretions she blamed for having fatally weakened her husband's health, and Leopold, who put up the most determined effort to break free from his mother's control. Last in the series

programme.title: Wellington: The Iron Duke Unmasked
programme.desc: The Duke of Wellington's victory over Napoleon at Waterloo in 1815 made him a towering figure in history, for both his achievements and for embodying the stiff-upper-lip notion of Britishness. This drama documentary focuses on the complexities of the man, drawing on his own correspondence to tell his story through his own words, and using the memoirs and diaries of those who knew him best. Richard E Grant plays Wellington in a series of dramatic reconstructions, creating an intimate portrait of a man who was, in turns, a general, a politician, a lover and an outsider

programme.title: The Genius of Turner: Painting the Industrial Revolution
programme.desc: Docu-drama revealing there is more to painter JMW Turner than his famous landscapes, examining key paintings incorporating machines, science and technology that reflect the scientific and industrial revolutions he lived through. Including interviews with historian Simon Schama and artist Tracey Emin. Narrated by Samuel West, with Thomas Coombes portraying Turner

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer

programme.sub-title: The Best of Both Worlds - Part Two.

Sci-fi adventure, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes and Brent Spiner

programme.title: Merlin
programme.sub-title: Beauty and the Beast - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Having married Uther, Queen Catrina increases her influence over Camelot. Her accusation that Merlin is a thief forces the wizard into hiding, leaving him to seek evidence that she is secretly a troll. If that were not hard enough, he must also identify the spell that will break her hold over the king. Fantasy drama, starring Colin Morgan and Anthony Head, with Sarah Parish and Adam Godley

programme.title: War of the Worlds 2: The Next Wave
programme.desc: The Martian forces return to destroy Earth - and only a direct attack on their home planet can stop them. Sci-fi thriller sequel, directed by and starring C Thomas Howell, with Kim Little and Jonathan Levit

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: As she faces an uncertain future after graduation, Buffy decides to take the initiative against the Mayor. When she learns the Mayor has acquired a powerful magical box that is vital to his ascension, she plans to steal it. But although the theft is a success, Willow is taken prisoner during the getaway, leaving the gang to choose between destroying the box or trading it for her life

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: The students of Sunnydale High look forward to their senior prom, unaware someone is plotting to ruin their big night by unleashing a pack of ferocious hellhounds. Angel comes to realise that Buffy will have a better future without him and decides to leave town. Xander finds himself with an unlikely prom date, as well as learning that Cordelia has fallen on hard times

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation

programme.title: Merlin

Morgana is certain the ruthless detective will burn her at the stake, so it is up to Merlin to try to save her without landing himself in trouble. Fantasy drama, guest starring Charles Dance, with Anthony Head and Colin Morgan

He meets a fellow patient who may hold the key to his mission, but the longer he spends in the past, the more he comes to question whether he really is from the future or simply delusional. Terry Gilliam's sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Brad Pitt, Madeleine Stowe and Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Battle of the Damned

Sci-fi adventure, starring Dolph Lundgren and Melanie Zanetti

programme.desc: Casey's disappearance takes a toll on her family, and Father Marcus asks for assistance from Mother Bernadette, while dealing with fallout from news of the girl's possession

programme.title: Killjoys
programme.desc: The hunt for a famous Killjoy who has gone rogue sees teams from around the system pitted against each other, but Khlyen has an ulterior agenda

programme.title: The Captains Close Up
programme.desc: A look back over Patrick Stewart's portrayal of Captain Jean-Luc Picard in Star Trek: The Next Generation

programme.title: 500 MPH Storm
programme.desc: A disastrous energy experiment unleashes a series of devastating hurricanes across America. A science teacher realises the movement of the winds into each other will result in a single continent-destroying storm, and tries to get his family to safety before it is too late. Adventure, starring Casper Van Dien and Michael Beach

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: As she faces an uncertain future after graduation, Buffy decides to take the initiative against the Mayor. When she learns the Mayor has acquired a powerful magical box that is vital to his ascension, she plans to steal it. But although the theft is a success, Willow is taken prisoner during the getaway, leaving the gang to choose between destroying the box or trading it for her life

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: The students of Sunnydale High look forward to their senior prom, unaware someone is plotting to ruin their big night by unleashing a pack of ferocious hellhounds. Angel comes to realise that Buffy will have a better future without him and decides to leave town. Xander finds himself with an unlikely prom date, as well as learning that Cordelia has fallen on hard times

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Picard returns to his roots in France as he recuperates from his ordeal at the hands of the Borg, Wesley Crusher receives a hologram message from his dead father, and Worf tries to cope with a visit from his non-Klingon parents

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The unexpected arrival of Data's destructive brother Lore causes a disruption when the Starfleet android is summoned by his creator to have a computer chip fitted - one which would grant him the ability to feel emotions. Sci-fi drama, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes and Brent Spiner

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: Uther invites notorious witch-hunter Aredian to Camelot in a desperate bid to rid the kingdom of magic, and no one is beyond his suspicion. Morgana is certain the ruthless detective will burn her at the stake, so it is up to Merlin to try to save her without landing himself in trouble. Fantasy drama, guest starring Charles Dance, with Anthony Head and Colin Morgan

programme.title: 10,000 Days
programme.desc: A collision with a comet devastates the Earth and leaves it a frozen wasteland. Years later, a family struggles to survive in the inhospitable landscape in the wake of a series of violent earthquakes. They find something buried in the ice that could hold the key to saving the human race - or destroying the world. Sci-fi drama, starring Kasey Campbell and Lydia Look

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Faith shoots Angel with a poisoned arrow that can only be cured by the blood of a slayer. Meanwhile, Giles and Wesley discover the Mayor's weakness - after the Ascension, he will no longer be indestructible. However, he will have become a pure demon, larger and more powerful than any monster they have ever faced

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: Part two of the two-part series finale. Buffy forces a dying Angel to drink her blood to save himself. When she recovers, she is ready to lead the students of Sunnydale High into a final battle with the Mayor and his horde of vampires, as the graduation ceremony finally brings about the Ascension - and the transformation of the villainous politician into his gigantic demonic form

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Picard comes to the rescue of a human child found on a Talarian vessel, and tries to return him to his grandmother, a Federation admiral. Problems arise when the boy's adoptive father demands the return of his son, and the child himself insists he wants to return to the species who raised him. Sci-fi adventure, starring Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Beverly Crusher sees the crew disappear around her, and discovers nobody but her remembers the missing personnel once they are gone. Racing against time as the Enterprise's crew rapidly dwindles, she tries to discover what mysterious force is taking her colleagues. Gates McFadden stars

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A challenge to Arthur from a mysterious warrior sets in motion a terrible chain of events, which leads to the uncovering of a dark secret that threatens the whole kingdom, as Merlin and the Prince respond to a request from the beautiful Morgause. Emilia Fox (Silent Witness) guest stars alongside Bradley James and Colin Morgan

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: A high-school student develops bizarre powers after being bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, and decides to become a costumed crimefighter. But his abilities are put to the test when a mad scientist embarks on a fiendish scheme to become immortal. Comedy spoofing comic-book movies, starring Drake Bell, Sara Paxton and Leslie Nielsen

programme.title: Lake Placid vs Anaconda
programme.desc: A lake becomes the setting for a battle for supremacy between giant mutated crocodiles and genetically engineered snakes. The local sheriff, who has battled the giant serpents before, joins forces with a game warden to prevent a group of female students from becoming the creatures' latest prey. Comedy horror, starring Corin Nemec, Yancy Butler and Robert Englund

programme.title: Marcella
programme.desc: In her desperate hunt for Matthew, Marcella questions Henry at his home. Meanwhile, the pressure mounts on Jason as Tim's investigation into the murder of Andrew Barnes gathers pace, and the killer is finally revealed, causing shockwaves among the entire team. Crime drama by The Bridge creator Hans Rosenfeldt, starring Anna Friel and Harry Lloyd. Last in the series

programme.title: Band of Gold
programme.desc: Part one of two. Carol accuses Vinnie of spending factory money and arranges for him to be beaten up. Powerful prostitution drama, starring Cathy Tyson and Geraldine James

programme.title: Band of Gold
programme.desc: Part two of two. Rose's job is placed in jeopardy when Sherrie confides in her. Powerful prostitution drama, starring Cathy Tyson and Geraldine James

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Cade leans on an old friend when he suspects the others are conspiring against him

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: A suicidal man refuses treatment that could save his life, presenting Mike with an ethical dilemma. Louise inadvertently puts a youngster at risk, but manages to save him with a radical new technique, while on the personal front, Christine fights to pull her marriage back from the brink. Medical drama set in a busy A&E department, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack, David Harewood and Esther Hall

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Clare unwittingly endangers an older patient's life, and although disaster is narrowly averted, David realises the time has come to step back and take a long, hard look at what's causing her erratic behaviour. Drama, starring Gary Mavers, Saskia Wickham and Adrian Lukis

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Sarah falls for the manservant of Capt Ryttsen, a dashing Swedish army officer who is staying in the Bellamy household as a guest of James, but later finds herself suspected of betraying her employers' trust by stealing from them. Vintage drama, starring Pauline Collins and Simon Williams

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Elizabeth's interest in socialism involves her with a group of intellectuals, putting her under the strong influence of an older woman with radical views and leading to a meeting with poet Lawrence Kirbridge. Nicola Pagett stars

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Cade leans on an old friend when he suspects the others are conspiring against him

Medical drama set in a busy A&E department, starring Martin Shaw, Niamh Cusack, David Harewood and Esther Hall

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike has problems when a man held in custody drops dead. Bernie and Greengrass establish a taxi firm and look for ways to make a profit

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Clare unwittingly endangers an older patient's life, and although disaster is narrowly averted, David realises the time has come to step back and take a long, hard look at what's causing her erratic behaviour. Drama, starring Gary Mavers, Saskia Wickham and Adrian Lukis

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Emotions run high when charges of harassment are brought within the Eastland force - and against it. Drama, starring Martin Shaw and Julian Glover

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Robert's skills are tested when he battles to save the lives of two road accident victims - one of whom is pregnant. Christine treats a criminal with strange symptoms, and David practises his bedside manner on two attractive young women

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Erica receives a tempting job offer and initially considers accepting it - but the plight of a career woman struck down by cancer, coupled with Andrew's comforting presence, makes her realise she'd be better off at the Beeches. Rural drama, starring Saskia Wickham, Gary Mavers, Adrian Lukis and Valerie Grogan

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Eternal bachelor Greengrass falls in love with an aristocratic lady poacher, and an old flame of Mike's turns up out of the blue to complicate his life. Rural capers, starring Nick Berry, Natasha Dahlberg and Frances de la Tour

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: As the Edwardian era draws to a close, the Bellamys' future hangs in the balance with Elizabeth continuing her attempts to break free of convention and James having a passionate reunion with Sarah, who has become a music-hall singer after her release from prison. Simon Williams, Nicola Pagett, Pauline Collins and Ian Ogilvy star

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Laurence embarks on another London trip, leaving his lovelorn wife Elizabeth at home. On overhearing a saucy chat between two servants, her uncontrollable jealousy prompts her to sack them both. Gordon Jackson, Nicola Pagett and Ian Ogilvy star

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Wealthy industrialist Sir Reuben Astwell is murdered after making a deal to sell synthetic rubber to the Germans, leaving the dapper sleuth wondering whether the motive was commercial or political. Evidence found in his chemical factory could hold the key to the mystery - but Poirot is unsure if the victim's widow can be trusted. Starring David Suchet, with Ann Bell and Bill Wallis

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A mysterious delivery causes Poirot to recall the time his supper at a Buenos Aires restaurant was rudely interrupted by the murder of a fellow diner, who unwittingly drank from a glass laced with cyanide. Drama, starring David Suchet and Philip Jackson

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An aristocrat's wealthy, overbearing wife finances a North African archaeological dig to find the skull of John the Baptist. Poirot is in attendance, but when the woman is found stabbed to death, and only her husband, the exuberant Lord Boynton, appears distraught, the detective struggles to identify the killer among the wealth of suspects. Guest starring Tim Curry, Cheryl Campbell, John Hannah, Emma Cunniffe, Mark Gatiss, Angela Pleasence and Beth Goddard, with David Suchet in the title role

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: When Hastings and a reluctant Poirot attend a grouse shoot at a friend's estate, one of the hunting party is murdered. Despite suffering a severe cold, the Belgian sleuth is roused from his sickbed to solve the case. David Suchet stars

programme.title: Paranoid
programme.desc: The brutal murder of a local GP in a children's playground appears to be an open-and-shut case when a detectives Bobby Day, Nina Suresh and Alec Wayfield identify the killer on CCTV. But it quickly turns out that there is more to the crime than meets the eye. Conspiracy thriller, starring Robert Glenister, Indira Varma and Dino Fetscher as the investigating trio, with Lesley Sharp, Neil Stuke, John Duttine, Anji Monhindra and Jason Done

programme.title: Brief Encounters
programme.desc: Steph bumps into Johnny after leaving the hairdresser and he invites her over to help him decorate, but Dean misunderstands the situation and tells Terry that she has a date with a policeman. As a nervous Pauline prepares to host her own party she is interrupted by a distraught Dawn, while Nita is furious with Kieren when she finds the money stolen from the bookmakers underneath her sink, but he tells her it's Dougie's money. Drama, starring Penelope Wilton, Sophie Rundle, Angela Griffin and Sharon Rooney

programme.title: Brief Encounters
programme.desc: At a recruitment fair at the community centre, Steph chats to the caretaker and agrees to go to his house to talk to his wife about hosting a party - a decision that may have far-reaching consequences. Dawn has to think seriously about her future when Russell tells her he can't cope with all the fuss she is making over their wedding preparations, while Nita puts her family first and gives Kieran an alibi for the hit-and-run. Drama, starring Penelope Wilton, Sophie Rundle, Angela Griffin and Sharon Rooney

programme.title: The Chief
programme.desc: Alan Cade's future is in doubt when he comes under fire from the tabloid press. Last in the series

programme.title: Always and Everyone
programme.desc: Christine is shocked to learn where her husband's affections really lie, and Robert challenges Louise to prove she is worthy of a place on his team, prompting her to consider moving on. Stuart is shaken by a patient's unexpected deterioration - especially as he had assured her parents there was nothing to worry about. Medical drama, starring Martin Shaw and Niamh Cusack

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Andrew's ex-wife turns up out of the blue, prompting him to re-examine his feelings for her and Erica. Clare's mental condition takes yet another turn for the worse, and an accident forces a local man to face the family he abandoned seven years previously. Medical drama, starring Gary Mavers, Adrian Lukis and Saskia Wickham

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A woman is admitted to hospital after a series of burglaries, and Nick and Jo start planning their life together. Greengrass and Bernie try their hand at modern art. Rural police drama, starring Nick Berry and Bill Maynard

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Scandal threatens to engulf Eaton Place as news spreads that James, already heavily in debt, has made one of the Bellamys' servants pregnant. Period drama, starring Gordon Jackson, Jean Marsh and David Langton

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: Elizabeth longs for a baby, but Lawrence is incapable of consummating their marriage and asks Sir Edwin Partridge to step in and help save it. Nicola Pagett and Gordon Jackson star

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A mysterious delivery causes Poirot to recall the time his supper at a Buenos Aires restaurant was rudely interrupted by the murder of a fellow diner, who unwittingly drank from a glass laced with cyanide. Drama, starring David Suchet and Philip Jackson

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Missing Will.
programme.desc: The sleuth sets out to solve the baffling murder of a Cambridge don who met with foul play shortly after deciding to change his will. Starring David Suchet, Beth Goddard and Mark Kingston

programme.title: Little Boy Blue
programme.desc: When potential witness Claire Olssen is intimidated into changing her statement, the investigation team look for alternative ways to reinforce their case. As Steve returns to work, Kelly is offered a deal that tests his resolve

programme.title: Little Boy Blue
programme.desc: Mercer and his associates are tried for their roles in the killing of 11-year-old Rhys Jones, but the verdict fails to bring closure for the boy's parents Melanie and Steve as the fractures in their relationship come to a head. Meanwhile an unexpected setback leaves Det Supt Dave Kelly with a tough decision to make. The concluding part of the fact-based drama centred on the devastating impact of a child's murder amid a wave of gang violence in Liverpool, starring Stephen Graham, Sinead Keenan and Brian F O'Byrne. Last in the series

programme.title: Jordskott
programme.desc: Eva is back at the Thornblad farm, but it is not how she had imagined. Koljonen makes a startling discovery. Mystery thriller, starring Moa Gammel. In Swedish

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The famously outspoken chef visits a lacklustre seafood restaurant in Brighton, where owner Allan Love hates fish so much he will not enter his own kitchen. That domain is shared by chefs Alex and James, both of whom agree they would not eat their own food. But with Allan losing £1,500 a week and his home likely to follow, Gordon has much work to do in a short space of time

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw secretly restore a 1992 Mazda RX-7, a Japanese sports car with an unusual rotary engine belonging to a charity worker with a degenerative eye condition

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: North London couple Jeremy Till and Sarah Wigglesworth draw up plans for an unusual combined home and office made of straw bales and sandbags. Kevin McCloud heads to Islington to find out whether they will be able to grow strawberries on the earth roof and make their dreams come true

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Uncut
programme.desc: Extended version of the irreverent panel show hosted by Jimmy Carr. Hannibal Buress, Sam Buttery, Stephen Mangan and Katherine Ryan join captains Jon Richardson and Sean Lock to answer questions based on opinion polls carried out around the country to see who best understands what is going on in Britain today

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty investigates how fresh supermarket fish really is, and Kate Quilton travels to Peru's Ica Valley to discover how asparagus can be cultivated all year round in one of the driest places on Earth. Matt Tebbutt heads to a secret location to track down UK-grown wasabi plants - and manages to sting his nostrils in the process

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps David Tomlinson and Andrea Metcalfe from Essex, who have decided that Spain's Costa de la Luz is the perfect place to buy a property

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Karen and John Leonard from Essex are close to retirement and fancy a new home in sunny Gran Canaria. Scarlette Douglas shows them five properties for their £175,000 budget

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at the contemporary Fraoch House in Edinburgh, where Gareth Houston and his mother Heather Davidson hope to impress the guests with their stylish interiors and modern approach to hospitality

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: A pair of newlywed B&B owners invite their rivals to a traditional establishment in Marple, Greater Manchester, hoping its quaint location will be enough to secure the prize. However, the guests soon make it abundantly clear that it will take more than an idyllic setting to fulfil their expectations

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Suzy Way, the owner of a modern and unconventional B&B near Loughborough, Leicestershire, and her sister Niki Brown prepare an activity-packed day featuring water sport wakeboarding and a home-made curry to win their guests over

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: John Benson is the last to host the group at his B&B in Braintree, Essex, where he hopes his strong business sense and capable manager will make a good impression. A day out at a skidpan track is not to everyone's liking, but dinner is a more relaxed affair, enhanced by spooky stories and a sing-song

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The four sets of owners discover what the other competitors think of their businesses by opening the cash-filled envelopes, which contain what their rivals believe their hosts should receive. They meet for one last time to learn who has won the best value B&B of the week

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Barber Kenny Flynn hosts the first dinner party in Liverpool. His evening has a `big kids' theme, so he prepares burger buns striped like a zebra and baby octopuses that resemble spiders. His guests are Nigerian model Cynthia Umezulike, rock music enthusiast Glen Simpson, businessman Rob Spicer and fine-dining enthusiast Jilly Pollock

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Multiple business owner Rob Spicer welcomes the diners to his home for the second party in Liverpool. He is convinced his `historical leader' theme will be a hit, but there is a shock in store as one of the guests reveals a secret about herself

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Model and barrister Cynthia Umezulike hosts the third dinner party in Liverpool, and hopes her meal including tribal fish, a traditional Nigerian jeloff and an exotic fruit platter will impress her guests

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Rock music enthusiast Glen Simpson hosts the fourth dinner party in Liverpool. He rustles up sticky blackened pork and an Elvis-inspired dessert of deep fat-fried chocolate bars with home-made peanut butter and banana ice-cream, but grievances among the guests threaten to derail the evening's entertainment

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Jilly Pollock hosts the fifth and final party in Liverpool, inviting her fellow contestants to a black-tie event. She prepares a selection of self-styled dishes for her diners, including figs, hot beef and berry delight, and hopes an evening of ballroom dancing will ease tensions following the previous night's arguments

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Anne Hogarth first fell in love with Lanzarote 10 years ago and now, after several visits to the island since, is looking for a holiday home to enjoy in her retirement. With her daughter Rachel along for moral support, Jonnie Irwin shows Anne five properties in the resort of Puerto del Carmen for her £85,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Although she's approaching retirement age, Karmen Meredith is in no mood to slow down. Instead, the Derbyshire woman is looking for a bolthole on Spain's Costa del Sol, so Danni Menzies shows her five properties to choose between

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Professor Noel Fitzpatrick and his team fight to save the leg of a much-loved golden retriever, and a French bulldog with twisted elbows needs a doggy wheelchair and some challenging surgery. At Noel's Oncology & Soft Tissue Hospital in Guildford, a spaniel cross has a tumour removed by specialist Professor Nick Bacon

programme.title: Grand Designs Revisited
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to Somerset to see Ed and Vicky Versluys and their cow shed conversion. A year after his last visit and with the house finally complete, Kevin finds out what it's like living in an off-grid home designed for animals

programme.title: Fatal Flight 447: Chaos in the Cockpit
programme.desc: The story of what really happened on June 1, 2009, when Air France Flight 447 from Rio de Janeiro to Paris plummeted into the Atlantic Ocean, killing all 228 passengers and crew. It remained a mystery how one of the world's most technologically advanced planes could seemingly just drop out of the sky, until a two-year search finally located the black-box recorders. This documentary reveals the scene on board the doomed airliner as the pilots struggled to understand the catastrophe unfolding before them, and asks what lessons have been learnt from the disaster

programme.title: What Destroyed the Hindenburg
programme.desc: The Hindenburg was one of the great engineering feats of the early 20th century, but on May 6, 1937, disaster struck when the airship crashed in New Jersey, killing 35 of the 97 people on board. Ever since, the cause of the tragedy has remained a mystery, with a static electric charge, a design flaw and an act of sabotage all blamed by experts. In this programme, a team including aeronautical engineer Jem Stansfield puts the leading theories to the test with the help of three scale models

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The famously outspoken chef comes to the aid of The Priory in Haywards Heath, Sussex, where the setting is the only idyllic aspect, thanks to the restaurant's elderly clientele, synthetic sauces and lazy head chef. Gordon has to inspire faith in good food and return the former convent to its heavenly origins because, losing £5,000 a week and with disaffected staff, the day of judgement approaches

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game as team captain Jon Richardson is joined by Rhod Gilbert to take on Lee Mack and Rob Beckett. Tim Key is in Dictionary Corner with Countdown regular Susie Dent, and Rachel Riley provides the letters and numbers with a little help from comedian Joe Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: Bodyshockers
programme.desc: Katie Piper meets Kimberley, who turned to the public and crowd-funding to raise money for a boob job, and Paul, who is covered in tattoos from head to toe and regrets every one of them. The programme also features Ander, who has thousands of piercings in an effort to cure his needle phobia, a girl with embarrassing inkings, and a tattoo virgin who wants to ink her entire body(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud charts the progress of a Doncaster couple building a futuristic glass and steel dream house on the edge of a conservation area. However, sibling rivalry threatens to derail the project as the maverick architect is the woman's brother(n)

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty heads to Sicily, where a vast network of tunnels leads to a subterranean salt-processing plant. Kate Quilton looks at free range hens, and is surprised to learn that most chicks on British farms have their beaks trimmed at birth. In the Netherlands, she visits a new cutting-edge farm designed using the latest scientific advances in hen welfare. Plus, in Scotland, Matt Tebbutt makes a surprising discovery about the origins of haggis, and then faces the ordeal of delivering some unwelcome news to an unsuspecting audience(n)

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Kate Quilton heads to Calabria, southern Italy, to find out how bitter-tasting liquorice roots are transformed into sweet treats. Jimmy Doherty discovers that some popular varieties of mushroom are not grown in woodland or even outdoors, while Matt Tebbutt uncovers the nasty bacteria potentially lurking in bean sprouts. He learns that consuming his favourite East Asian vegetable raw could be as risky as eating some oysters, so heads to a factory in Northern Ireland to find out how they can be sold as `ready to eat'(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Anne Hogarth first fell in love with Lanzarote 10 years ago and now, after several visits to the island since, is looking for a holiday home to enjoy in her retirement. With her daughter Rachel along for moral support, Jonnie Irwin shows Anne five properties in the resort of Puerto del Carmen for her £85,000 budget(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Although she's approaching retirement age, Karmen Meredith is in no mood to slow down. Instead, the Derbyshire woman is looking for a bolthole on Spain's Costa del Sol, so Danni Menzies shows her five properties to choose between(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Claire Hilton, who runs Robertsbrook Guest House in Swanage, Dorset, feels she has a good chance of winning the title of best B&B as another round of the competition gets under way. However, guests Lynn Self and Ziggy Broome have doubts over the cleanliness of their bedroom, and another couple are accustomed to more opulent surroundings(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Lynn Self and Ziggy Broome hope to impress with their two-star B&B Eden Lodge in Falmouth, Cornwall. However, the state of their property disappoints their fellow competitors. At dinner, James and Maria Church reveal the truth about their famous daughter Charlotte, and the following morning's breakfast reduces some of the guests to fits of giggles(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the turn of Charlotte Church's parents James and Maria to play host at Dexby Townhouse in Cardiff, and they pull out all the stops by laying on a day of white-water rafting and a magic performance courtesy of their nephew Elliot. But the following morning, some of the guests are kept waiting for breakfast(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Newlyweds Pip Easby and Nicky Lesser-Easby, who run Muddifords Court Country House in Devon, open their doors for the final stay of the competition. The Churches find their four-poster bed too small, and not all the guests enjoy their trip to a local glass-blowing factory, but feedback at check-out time leaves the hosts feeling confident(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and to air their grievances. An underpayment from a surprising source changes the dynamics of the group and throws the competition wide open, before the winner is announced(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

Crime drama, starring Missy Peregrym and Peter Mooney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man is found stabbed to death in an alleyway, and the detectives discover he shined shoes for a living. They begin by looking for his most recent customers, and learn the victim was a Vietnam war veteran, shedding light on possible motives and suspects

programme.title: Columbo: A Matter of Honour
programme.desc: The sleuth's holiday in Mexico is disrupted by a bizarre death involving a suave retired bullfighter, who has killed his best friend using one of the animals as a murder weapon - but is determined his spotless image and reputation will remain untarnished. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Ricardo Montalban, A Martinez and Pedro Armendariz Jr

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Agent Callen poses as an arms trade contact in a bid to catch killer Michael Aaron Rivkin. Meanwhile, Tony fears Ziva may not be loyal to the team, and a psychologist uncovers the truth about the relationship between Gibbs and Agent Macy. With Chris O'Donnell, Louise Lombard and LL Cool J

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Halstead's life is put in danger when the surviving Bembenek brother hires an assassin to avenge his dead sibling. Chicago Fire spin-off, starring Jason Beghe and Sophia Bush

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green are called in to identify the charred remains of a woman caught in an apartment block fire, which was started deliberately. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Southerlyn battle the lawyers over the fatal shooting of an uninvited nightclub guest who was seen confronting popular rap star Darry `G-Trane' moments before the murder. Award-winning police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Elisabeth Rohm

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team tries to help a seriously injured and traumatised woman remember the events that led to the fatal shooting of her street dancer boyfriend in their hotel room. Mac pursues a lead suggesting the victim was killed by a rival artist - but Hawkes makes a breakthrough in the lab that indicates he was targeted by someone he should have been able to trust. Gary Sinise stars

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man falls from a bridge in what appears to be a straightforward suicide, but lab results reveal he was shot in the chest before being thrown off. Hawkes dives into the Hudson River to search for the murder weapon, and discovers an antique that reveals the `Compass killer' has returned and claimed his third victim. Crime drama, starring Hill Harper

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a marine off the coast of Tanzania - a case complicated by the discovery that he had a link to Ziva. The mystery deepens even further with the recovery of wreckage from a sunken freighter. Starring Mark Harmon, Cote de Pablo, David McCallum, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the Halloween murder of a marine with a fondness for playing practical jokes. As the evidence accumulates, they begin to suspect he was killed by the exasperated victim of one of his pranks. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives team up with their counterparts in the Chicago Intelligence Unit to take down a child pornography ring. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Ice-T

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An emotionally disturbed man claims to have witnessed a rape in a hospital. Despite the witness's dubious credibility the SVU investigates, but the alleged victim denies being assaulted. Crime drama, guest starring Natasha Lyonne and Carrie Preston

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the disappearance of a Romany boy proves difficult because of his community's distrust of outsiders. When detectives identify a neighbour as the prime suspect, it causes much distress within the close-knit group

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: New series. Drama series based on the film trilogy of the same name, with Clive Standen starring as a younger version of Liam Neeson's character, Bryan Mills. In the opening episode, the murder of Bryan's sister sets him on a course for revenge against a cartel boss. He kills the son of the terrorist and drug lord Carlos Mejia, while saving the life of an undercover DEA agent, Mike Hall

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Aubrey work together to catch the culprit of a crime that involved a teenager being shot in front of his 10-year-old brother and having a watch of high sentimental value stolen. Meanwhile, Flack develops a bond with the young witness. Crime drama, starring Eddie Cahill

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The body of a retired boxer is found encased in concrete at a building site, setting the detectives on the trail of his killer. As the investigation progresses, they become embroiled in the world of illegal fighting, where men moonlight as gladiatorial warriors. Crime drama, guest starring Brendan Fehr (Roswell) and Don Yates (American Gladiators)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Olivia Benson from New York's SVU unit travels to Chicago to investigate when local nurse Victoria is almost killed by an attacker wearing medical scrubs. Victoria's nails were painted green before she was set on fire by her attacker, and the MO seems to match that of a killer Benson has been tracking for 10 years. When it emerges Jay's brother Will has connections to two of the victims, a promising line of inquiry is opened, one which seems to lead to an eminent professor from Columbia University. Crime drama, guest starring Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hartigay

Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Richard Kiley and Rosemary Murphy

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a publishing executive last seen engaged in a heated argument over a taxi. However, a technicality arises in the case, threatening to deny them the conviction. Starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise

programme.desc: The team responds to an emergency call from a luxury penthouse, and arrives to find a mummified corpse in the living room. programme.desc: Sue Perkins immerses herself in the complexities of life in the West Bengal state capital, formerly known as Calcutta, to detail how the city once known for its notorious `black hole' dungeon and impoverished street people has transformed into a diverse, 21st-century megacity with a booming property market and a reputation for tolerance. She meets some of Kolkata's 250,000 `street kids', who spend their time hustling for a living, and the wealthy young entrepreneurs who race their high-performance cars down the streets of New Town. She also navigates the city's narrow lanes with rickshaw wallahs, and descends into Kolkata's Victorian-era sewers as part of a large-scale clean-up project(n)

programme.title: Battleplan
programme.desc: Examining the effectiveness of speed in warfare, highlighting two real-life instances in which military leaders have looked to make a quick incursion into enemy lines. The first involved the rapid penetration of Western Europe by German Panzer forces during the Second World War. The second involved Operation Iraqi Freedom in March 2003, when American mechanised forces raced more than 350 miles through Iraq in just 15 days

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and his team head to an army training ground on Salisbury Plain to discover what lies beneath the Barrow Clump, a huge mound of earth built by Bronze Age people to bury their dead. More than 2,500 years later, the Anglo-Saxons re-used the location as a burial site, leaving behind some fascinating artefacts. The team is joined for the dig by a group of wounded soldiers whose members are being trained in archaeology as part of their rehabilitation

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Coast
programme.desc: The team explores the Welsh coast. Nick Crane investigates evidence that a devastating tsunami hit 400 years ago, and finds out why scientists planning a trip to Mars find the local landscape a surprisingly good stand-in for the red planet's surface. Alice Roberts tests the claim that the world's first powered flight was made by a Welsh carpenter seven years before the Wright brothers and Dick Strawbridge reveals how, in 1947, a man on holiday to Anglesey came up with the design for a new car that would conquer the world - the Land Rover

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show, in which five pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong

programme.title: Time Team Specials
programme.sub-title: Pugin - The God of Gothic: A Time Team Special.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson follows the renovation of the Grange, a house in Ramsgate, Kent, formerly owned by 19th-century architect Augustus Pugin, co-creator of the Houses of Parliament. Pugin's designs for the home became a blueprint for thousands of properties built after his death and in 20 years he succeeded in changing the face of England. With the help of experts such as Grand Designs' Kevin McCloud, the Landmark Trust aims to restore a piece of history

programme.title: Coast

programme.title: Impossible Engineering
programme.desc: The Rion-Antirion Bridge, which runs for 3kms and links the town of Rio on the Peloponnese peninsula to Antirrio on mainland Greece. Located in one of Europe's most active seismic zones, its engineers had to conquer the problems of deep water, high winds and constant land mass movement to build the colossal structure

programme.title: A Tale of Two Sisters
programme.desc: The political divide between sisters Jessica and Diane Mitford, one of whom abandoned high society to embrace communism while the other married fascist leader Oswald Mosely

programme.title: New Zealand: Earth's Mythical Islands
programme.desc: Sam Neill narrates the story of some of New Zealand's wildest places, home to hyper-intelligent parrots, snails with teeth, and constellations of glow-worms. In these often inhospitable locations, any creature hoping to survive must resort to radical techniques, none more so than on the South Island, which lies toward Antarctica and is home to the rapidly rising peaks of the Southern Alps

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the region's islands, which are home to a vast array of extraordinary wildlife. The programme reveals how remote human communities native to the area are surrounded by harsh terrain and subjected to extreme weather conditions. Benedict Cumberbatch narrates

programme.title: Battleplan
programme.desc: The tactic of pre-emptive striking deployed in military conflict - such as the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbour in 1941 - a mode of attack more often employed by political magnates than army commanders(n)

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: Tony Robinson and the team head to the Lake District to look for copper, a forgotten piece of the nation's industrial heritage. There are nearly two dozen old mines across the mountains, some thought to have been established 400 years ago when the valleys would have been studded with workshops, scaffolding and water-powered machines, home to a brave band of Tudor miners. The team battles the rain, wind and dangerously unstable trackways, but the combination of sheer effort and hi-tech kit enables the experts to access the heart of an old mine(n)

programme.desc: The team explores British connections to the Swedish coast. Nick Crane views a mountain range still rising at the rate of one centimetre a year - and discovers a similar phenomenon is also occurring in the Highlands. Alice Roberts reveals how merchant seamen from Hull helped save the Second World War military effort by sneaking a vital shipment of Swedish ball bearings past the German Navy(n)

programme.title: Time Team Specials
programme.sub-title: The Real Knights of the Round Table: A Time Team Special.
programme.desc: Tony Robinson examines the enigmatic Round Table building constructed by Edward III, the foundations of which lie beneath the Queen's private lawn at Windsor Castle. His journey of discovery takes him back into the heart of medieval chivalry, to a Majorcan castle and into the well-preserved royal accounts at Kew as he finds out how the structure was a stepping stone to the monarch becoming one of England's most successful kings(n)

programme.title: New Zealand: Earth's Mythical Islands
programme.desc: New Zealand is now home to some of the richest agricultural land in the world, boasting magnificent gardens with plants from around the planet and rare magical creatures. A caving expedition reveals relics of the original lost world of its pre-human past; the actual bones of a cow-sized flightless grazing bird, a moa, among the largest birds that has ever lived. However, as narrator Sam Neill reveals, against all the odds, one giant bird from primeval New Zealand has survived to this day. Last in the series(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A look at how the 20,000 islands in the region became colonised by humans and animals. programme.title: Homeland
programme.desc: New series. The espionage drama returns for a seventh season. Saul and the 200 other federal employees detained after the attempt on the President-elect's life are still in prison, while the new head of state's administration continues to come under scrutiny. Carrie has left her position in the White House and is living with her sister Maggie and her family as she takes on the Keane administration and tries to secure the release of her mentor and colleagues. Starring Claire Danes and Mandy Patinkin

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: New series. The return of the programme that follows the work of Bedfordshire Police around-the-clock, with enquiries covered from the cells at Luton to the operational heart of major cases. The first edition goes behind the scenes of a major investigation into an allegation of police corruption, with the unprecedented access given by the police meaning that cameras are allowed to document all of the twists and turns of the case as detectives track down, arrest and then charge one of their fellow officers

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo

The staff also hope to breed dominant female giant otter Icana with new arrival Diego and plan to bring two feuding sloths closer together, while setting up a speed-dating event for three-legged chameleon Tripod

programme.title: The Supervet
