Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: After being sentenced to death, murder suspect Callum Lynch enters a virtual world in the search for a device that contains genetic code for free will. Video game adaptation, starring Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons and Brendan Gleeson(n)

programme.title: The King's Choice
programme.desc: With the German army advancing on Norway, King Haakon VII faces a decision that will change his country forever. Historical drama, starring Jesper Christensen, Anders Baasmo Christiansen and Karl Markovics. In Norwegian, Danish and German

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A high-school dropout in the 1970s lands a job with a leading hardcore porn director, and is thrown into a strange world inhabited by bizarre characters - only to find fame and fortune come at a price. Drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Burt Reynolds, Julianne Moore, William H Macy, Heather Graham and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: Long Way North
programme.desc: A Russian aristocrat travels to the North Pole in search of her grandfather, a missing explorer. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chloe Dunn, Geoffrey Greenhill and Tom Morton

programme.title: Junction 48
programme.desc: An aspiring Palestinian rapper struggles to find his voice in the face of family tragedy and simmering Arab-Israeli tensions. Israeli drama, starring Tamer Nafar, Samar Qupty and Salwa Nakkara. In Arabic and Hebrew

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: An ambitious farmer's daughter travels to Paris in 1971, where she falls in love with a radical feminist. She finds herself obliged to return to the family farm, and her new lover accompanies her on the journey, but their relationship is greeted with disapproval. Romantic drama, starring Cecile De France and Izia Higelin. In French

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall

programme.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
programme.desc: A lawyer risks the wrath of his neighbours in a racially divided backwater in Alabama by agreeing to defend a black man on a rape charge. As he struggles to shield his son and daughter from the case's disturbing undertones, the children also have to confront their fear of a local recluse. Oscar-winning, Depression-era drama based on the classic novel by Harper Lee, starring Gregory Peck, Robert Duvall, Mary Badham and Phillip Alford

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: A transgender man arrives in a small town and soon proves to be a big hit with its residents, even winning the heart of a local woman. When his new friends discover he is anatomically female, they quickly turn against him, and plot a horrific act of violence. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Hilary Swank alongside Chloe Sevigny and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall(n)

programme.title: The Birth of a Nation
programme.desc: Biopic of Nat Turner, the literate plantation preacher who led a slave rebellion in 1831 Virginia, starring Nate Parker, Armie Hammer and Penelope Ann Miller(n)

programme.title: The Measure of a Man
programme.desc: An unemployed man struggles to support his wife and son on meagre state benefits, while contending with pointless and humiliating bureaucracy as she searches for a job. He is eventually employed as a firm's head of security, only to discover his new position confronts him with a terrible moral dilemma. Drama, starring Vincent Lindon and Karine de Mirbeck. In French(n)

programme.title: Iona
programme.desc: A woman fleeing the aftermath of a violent crime seeks refuge on the Scottish island where she grew up, bringing her teenage son with her. Her return has serious ramifications for the friends she left behind, while the boy grows to understand a simpler way of life than he is used to and discovers why his mother rebelled against it. Drama, starring Ruth Negga and Douglas Henshall(n)

programme.title: The Here After
programme.desc: A teenager is released from a young offenders' institution and returns to his family home. He is forced to endure a life of silent misery as his past crimes inspire bullying from his schoolfriends, while their suspicious parents take steps to drive him from the community altogether. His only solace comes in a friendship with a girl who is fascinated by his dark past. Drama, starring Ulrik Munther and Mats Blomgren. In Swedish(n)

programme.title: Lemon
programme.desc: A calamity-stricken actor's career and personal life starts crumbling around him. Comedy drama, starring Brett Gelman, Judy Greer and Michael Cera(n)

programme.title: Cemetery of Splendour
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in a small town on the Mekong River in northern Thailand are struck with a bizarre sleeping illness. Fantasy drama, starring Jenjira Pongpas, Banlop Lomnoi and Jarinpattra Rueangram. In Thai(n)

programme.title: The Shape of Water: Special
programme.desc: A preview of Guillermo del Toro's Golden Globe-winning, Oscar-nominated fantasy romance, which stars Sally Hawkins, Michael Shannon and Richard Jenkins(n)

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
programme.desc: Jill McBain arrives in a frontier town to meet her husband, only to find he has been murdered. A railway tycoon wants the land Jill and her husband own, and has hired a ruthless hitman to kill them. But an outlaw, who was falsely accused of the crime, and a mysterious, vengeful stranger decide to protect her. Sergio Leone's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Jason Robards, Claudia Cardinale and Charles Bronson(n)

programme.title: Cardboard Boxer
programme.desc: A gentle soul living rough on the streets of Los Angeles is lured into fighting other homeless men for money. Drama, starring Thomas Haden Church, Terrence Howard and Boyd Holbrook(n)

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey(n)

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones(n)

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory with Jesse Ventura
programme.desc: Stories of the infamous Area 51 in Nevada, examining tales of UFO sightings and alien abductions as well as theories that these are hoaxes to distract people from the real truth

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory with Jesse Ventura
programme.desc: Jesse goes to Dallas to investigate the assassination of President Kennedy, examining connections with the Watergate scandal and meeting Lee Harvey Oswald's widow

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Interview with John Woo, director of Hong Kong thrillers Bullet in the Head and Hard Boiled, as well as Hollywood action movies Face/Off and Broken Arrow

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Interview with John Boorman, director of Deliverance, Excalibur, Point Blank and Zardoz

programme.title: Tribute to a Bad Man
programme.desc: A wealthy land owner becomes consumed with hatred with the band of rustlers who shot him when he tried to stop them stealing his horses. As more animals are stolen, he becomes determined to kill the criminals, but his lust for blood drives his lover into the arms of another man - a ranch hand who once saved his life. Western, starring James Cagney, Irene Papas and Don Dubbins

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights buy a prize bull, only for the animal to be stolen. Little Joe is threatened by a Mexican woman's jealous fiance

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take in the daughter of a bandit after her father and brother are hanged for their crimes. Adam suspects her family's partners-in-crime are planning another robbery

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: An unscrupulous timber baron is determined to get his hands on some land heavily forested with redwoods and owned by a small Quaker community. However, he has a change of heart when he falls in love with one of the Quaker women, and has to contend with other less principled rivals who are also after the land. Romantic drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Eve Miller, Edgar Buchanan and Patrice Wymore

programme.title: Tribute to a Bad Man
programme.desc: A wealthy land owner becomes consumed with hatred with the band of rustlers who shot him when he tried to stop them stealing his horses. As more animals are stolen, he becomes determined to kill the criminals, but his lust for blood drives his lover into the arms of another man - a ranch hand who once saved his life. Western, starring James Cagney, Irene Papas and Don Dubbins

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges

programme.title: I'm All Right Jack
programme.desc: A dim-witted man looking for a career in industry gets a job at his uncle's weapons factory. He ends up an unwitting pawn of both the scheming management and the rebellious trade union, and becomes a central figure in a strike that has been manipulated as part of a dodgy arms deal. Satirical comedy, starring Ian Carmichael, Peter Sellers, Terry-Thomas and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Ride the High Country
programme.desc: An ageing marshal hires his former partner to help him protect a shipment of gold bullion. However, as the two old friends cuss and quarrel over the course of their journey, the lawman comes to realise his buddy is struggling with the temptation to steal the valuable cargo. Sam Peckinpah's Western, with Joel McCrea, Randolph Scott, Mariette Hartley, James Drury and Edgar Buchanan

programme.title: Sullivan's Travels
programme.desc: A movie director tires of making fluffy comedies and decides to make a make a serious film about life during the Great Depression. However, he knows nothing about poverty or suffering, so to broaden his horizons he disguises himself as a tramp and takes a journey across America, finding love with an out-of-work actress along the way. Preston Sturges' comedy drama, with Joel McCrea, Veronica Lake, Robert Warwick and William Demarest

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Detectives Riggs and Murtaugh team up with a reformed small-time crook and a tough, female internal-affairs investigator to track down a former policeman trafficking impounded weaponry to the bosses of organised crime. Action thriller sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci and Rene Russo

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Two rival LA detectives are constant thorns in the side of a ruthless drug baron, so he has them framed for murder and sent to prison. Surrounded by vengeful crooks they put behind bars, the combative duo are forced to bury their differences to escape and prove their innocence. Action adventure, with Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Russell, Teri Hatcher and Jack Palance

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory with Jesse Ventura
programme.desc: Jesse examines the causes of the financial meltdown and how stock market prices are manipulated

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory with Jesse Ventura
programme.desc: How corporations are buying water rights, giving them control over the people living depending on the sources they obtain

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Interview with Richard Donner, director of The Omen, Superman and The Goonies

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Interview with Andrew Davis, director of The Fugitive and Holes

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: Interview with Jan de Bont, director of Speed and Twister

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: An unscrupulous timber baron is determined to get his hands on some land heavily forested with redwoods and owned by a small Quaker community. However, he has a change of heart when he falls in love with one of the Quaker women, and has to contend with other less principled rivals who are also after the land. Romantic drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Eve Miller, Edgar Buchanan and Patrice Wymore

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe befriends a shady gold and silver exporter, but Ben is convinced he is up to no good and the disagreement threatens to drive the family apart

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss and Little Joe are mistaken for hired killers while visiting a Texas town dominated by two feuding families

programme.title: Sullivan's Travels
programme.desc: A movie director tires of making fluffy comedies and decides to make a make a serious film about life during the Great Depression. However, he knows nothing about poverty or suffering, so to broaden his horizons he disguises himself as a tramp and takes a journey across America, finding love with an out-of-work actress along the way. Preston Sturges' comedy drama, with Joel McCrea, Veronica Lake, Robert Warwick and William Demarest

Sam Peckinpah's Western, with Joel McCrea, Randolph Scott, Mariette Hartley, James Drury and Edgar Buchanan

programme.title: I'm All Right Jack
programme.desc: A dim-witted man looking for a career in industry gets a job at his uncle's weapons factory. He ends up an unwitting pawn of both the scheming management and the rebellious trade union, and becomes a central figure in a strike that has been manipulated as part of a dodgy arms deal. Satirical comedy, starring Ian Carmichael, Peter Sellers, Terry-Thomas and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald O'Connor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make 'em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: The Naked Spur
programme.desc: An embittered bounty hunter spends weeks on the trail of an elusive outlaw in the hope of claiming the $5,000 reward on his head. However, he makes the mistake of enlisting two dubious acquaintances to help him - an error of judgement that threatens to cost him more than just the money. Anthony Mann's Western, starring James Stewart, Robert Ryan, Ralph Meeker, Millard Mitchell and Janet Leigh

programme.title: Day of the Outlaw
programme.desc: A rancher takes action after a gang of renegade soldiers rides into town and causes trouble, giving their mortally wounded leader the false assurance that he will guide the outlaws to a safe place in the mountains, where they can hole up and escape the law - on the condition they leave the townsfolk in peace. Western, starring Robert Ryan, Burl Ives, Tina Louise, Nehemiah Persoff and Alan Marshal

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Two rival LA detectives are constant thorns in the side of a ruthless drug baron, so he has them framed for murder and sent to prison. Surrounded by vengeful crooks they put behind bars, the combative duo are forced to bury their differences to escape and prove their innocence. Action adventure, with Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Russell, Teri Hatcher and Jack Palance

programme.title: Eraser
programme.desc: An arms industry executive is placed in danger after she exposes evidence of illegal deals by an international corporation. The authorities respond by assigning her to the custody of a government agent who specialises in helping federal witnesses disappear from the system. However, when the operative is framed for murder, he is forced to balance his duties with efforts to clear his own name. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Caan, Vanessa L Williams and James Coburn

programme.title: The Best Man Holiday
programme.desc: A writer is worried about his future after losing his job at a university, and is also wrestling with the prospect of imminent fatherhood. He and his wife attend a Christmas reunion of his old friends from college, only to find all the guests have personal crises of their own to deal with. Comedy drama sequel, starring Taye Diggs, Sanaa Lathan, Morris Chestnut and Terrence Howard

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: An Italian socialite rebels against her domineering father and gets a job as a maid for a widowed father. While helping her employer learn to understand his three precocious children, she also falls in love with him and must decide whether or not to reveal her secret. Romantic comedy, starring Cary Grant and Sophia Loren

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: A luxury cruise liner at sea on New Year's Eve is struck by a freak tidal wave, which leaves it capsized and several passengers and crew trapped. A rebellious priest realises the ship is sinking fast, and leads a band of survivors up through the vessel in search of a way to the surface. Disaster movie, starring Gene Hackman, Ernest Borgnine, Shelley Winters, Leslie Nielsen and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: A divorcee forms a relationship with a group of latter-day cowboys struggling to eke out a living roping wild horses in the Nevada desert. John Huston's Western, starring Marilyn Monroe, Clark Gable, Montgomery Clift, Eli Wallach and Thelma Ritter

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman Interview Special
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Charlize Theron and Chris Hemsworth discuss making the fantasy adventure

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistress's evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrant's rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Lady Bird Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Greta Gerwig and star Saoirse Ronan talk about making their beautifully observed coming-of-age story

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac

programme.title: Secretary
programme.desc: A shy and lonely woman who often indulges in self-harm is released from a mental hospital and returns to her Florida home town, where she takes a job as a lawyer's secretary. She soon embarks on a sadomasochistic relationship with her domineering boss that has a dramatic effect on both their lives. Steven Shainberg's comedy drama starring Maggie Gyllenhaal, James Spader, Lesley Ann Warren and Stephen McHattie

programme.title: Damsels in Distress
programme.desc: University freshman Lily is taken under the wing of ambitious, upbeat Violet and her clique, who are determine to stop the female members of the student body from letting their standards slip or succumbing to misery. However, friendships within the group are strained by romantic entanglements. Comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Analeigh Tipton, Megalyn Echikunwoke and Carrie MacLemore(n)

programme.title: In a Lonely Place
programme.desc: A quick-tempered screenwriter becomes chief suspect in the murder of a nightclub cloakroom attendant who was seen leaving his house. A sympathetic neighbour agrees to provide him with an alibi, but her growing doubts over his innocence drive him to violence. Film noir suspense thriller, based on the novel by Dorothy B Hughes, with Humphrey Bogart, Gloria Grahame, Frank Lovejoy and Carl Benton Reid(n)

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Wealthy eccentric Sir Vincent Brampton arrives in Nairobi intent on hunting a legendary man-eating lion, and employs the services of disgraced big-game hunter Ken Duffield, who decides to use the expedition as an opportunity to settle an old score with the ruthless Kenyan terrorist who murdered his son. Adventure set during the Mau Mau Uprising in Kenya, starring Victor Mature, Roland Culver and Earl Cameron(n)

programme.title: Thunder Over Arizona
programme.desc: An honest cowboy is mistaken for the notorious outlaw he killed in self-defence. Before he can clear up the misunderstanding, he is approached by a corrupt mayor who draws him into a conspiracy to wrest control of a silver mine from its rightful owners. Western, starring Skip Homeier, Kristine Miller, George Macready and Wallace Ford(n)

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews(n)

programme.title: The Iron Lady Interview Special
programme.desc: Meryl Streep discusses her Oscar-winning performance as Margaret Thatcher(n)

programme.title: The Iron Lady
programme.desc: The elderly Margaret Thatcher, now living in seclusion, tries to come to terms with the death of her husband Denis, bringing back memories of her controversial political career. She reflects on her rise to power in the male-dominated Conservative Party and the tumultuous events during her time in office. Biopic, starring an Oscar-winning Meryl Streep. With Jim Broadbent and Olivia Colman(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A band of samurai is betrayed by a ruthless warlord who murders the warriors' master and banishes them from their homeland. They receive fresh hope in the shape of a mysterious former slave, who leads them into battle against monstrous and magical enemies as they seek to reclaim their former status. Fantasy adventure, starring Keanu Reeves and Hiroyuki Sanada(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: A boxing champion's successful life is brought to an abrupt end when tragedy strikes. He turns to a trainer coaching amateur fighters in a run-down gym for help and tries to rebuild his sporting career - while also striving to regain the lost trust of his wife and daughter. Drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Forest Whitaker and Rachel McAdams(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and another officer team up to track down a serial killer, focusing their investigation on a recently released sex offender - but fresh evidence leads them to believe he may have been wrongly convicted. Concerned that a miscarriage of justice could have occurred, they look over old case files and turn their attention to the suspect's neighbour, a man with employment links in the vicinity of seven murders around the country. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and David Keith

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Terror suspect Sonya Barak goes on the run from assassins sent by her own side, forcing Horatio and the team to race against time to recapture her and bring her to justice. Meanwhile, the presence of a cameraman recording the work of the lab causes Wolfe to make a mistake and compromise vital evidence. Starring David Caruso and Jonathan Togo

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the death of a troubled NYPD officer, a man with mounting financial difficulties who was killed by colleagues after taking hostages at gunpoint. As the pair dig deeper into his life, they discover a stash of valuable documents in his apartment as well as a body, and the evidence leads to a man claiming to be the illegitimate son of a famous president

programme.title: Numb3rs
programme.desc: A comic-book convention turns into a crime scene when a robbery leads to the disappearance of a rare publication. American drama, starring Rob Morrow as an FBI agent who recruits his mathematical genius brother to help the Bureau solve crimes in Los Angeles. With David Krumholtz

programme.title: Numb3rs
programme.desc: A former FBI subcontractor guns down an agent and captures a member of Don's team, holding him hostage in a lift. Desperate to avoid conflict, Charlie suggests a solution to the crisis - but his idea is ignored. Drama, starring Rob Morrow

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to buy bargains galore at home

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A cruise ship docked in Miami becomes the scene of a double murder, and the team's investigation is made easier by a large amount of money missing from the victims' stateroom. Meanwhile, Horatio and Marisol's relationship evolves. Guest starring James Remar (Sex and the City)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Bernard and Lupo investigate the suspected hit-and-run death of the mistress of the CEO of a failed investment bank. The evidence leads the pair to a kidnapping and extortion plot that uncovers several potential suspects, including a disgruntled client

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The team investigates when a journalist is found murdered, but the case presents new evidence for an old crime involving a man serving a life sentence for spying for the Chinese government. Keith Carradine guest stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the brutal murder of a TV reporter who had been alleging that a billionaire Wall Street investment adviser was a fraud. Evidence of love triangles and hedge fund fraud soon comes to the fore. Crime drama, starring Jeremy Sisto and Anthony Anderson

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate when an illegal immigrant is attacked, and the incident is connected to a spate of hate crimes against Hispanic men. The prosecution of some teenagers for the crime proves to be a thorny and delicate issue for the District Attorney's office

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the murders of a firefighter and his wife. The case leads to one of the dead man's colleagues, whom the detectives suspect resorted to extreme measures to cover up the crime - but prosecutors at the district attorney's office discover that taking the suspect to court could have serious political repercussions

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Ziva and Gibbs lead the mission to rescue the captured Marine in Afghanistan before discovering that her captor's brothers have bigger plans and are at large in America. Gibbs has to be stopped when he tries to employ methods similar to those used on Kinah and Lala in an effort to gain information, but Vance has a trick that gives the agents an idea of what the siblings have in mind

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony is forced to tackle a case with a personal element when his father is discovered drunk in a car that has a dead body in the boot. The victim is revealed to be Navy lieutenant Dean Massey, who DiNozzo Sr had threatened to kill after being cut out of a land development deal. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Navy captain Jake Marsden is murdered in his hotel room and inquiries lead to marine lieutenant Emma Reynolds - who tells the team she was the intended target. After being stationed in Kabul, she became pregnant by a local man called Amir who was later killed in action - and Abby discovers he was the sole male heir of a wealthy family that owns a large tract of land in a politically sensitive part of Afghanistan

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy commander last seen in the company of a mysterious blonde woman, who turns out to be missing NCIS agent and Tony's ex-lover EJ Barrett. She identifies the murderer as Seal-turned-assassin Marcellus Dane, who is suspected of working for Casey Stratton - a member of black ops unit Phantom Eight. Guest starring Sarah Jane Morris

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Natalia is arrested for the murder of her abusive ex-husband Nick Townsend, but the team is sidelined from the investigation by Internal Affairs, leaving it up to Horatio and Calleigh to prove her innocence. In a separate investigation, a wealthy single man is found dead in his mansion - and subsequent developments reveal the two cases are related

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah

credits.actor: Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman, Queen Latifah

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is shot outside a gay club, the detectives' investigations lead to his family, where they discover the wife of the dead man has a turbulent past. Forensic testing connects the victim to the filming of a porn movie - but the team does not expect to find out his spouse is also involved in the industry. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team's search for a serial rapist leads to a suspect who as a child was the victim of the same type of crime at the hands of his father - prompting his lawyer to cite genetics as the reason for his actions. Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek star

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Dann Florek

programme.desc: Charlie finds his life placed in danger after an interview he gives regarding the disappearance of an investigative reporter attracts the attention of the kidnappers involved. David Krumholtz and Rob Morrow star

programme.title: Numb3rs
programme.desc: The team tracks a serial rapist, but the case takes a sinister twist when it is discovered he is a police officer using his position to trap his victims. Drama, starring Rob Morrow

programme.desc: The body of an heiress is found in a bath at a party, and the team discovers there is no shortage of suspects. programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the murders of a firefighter and his wife. The case leads to one of the dead man's colleagues, whom the detectives suspect resorted to extreme measures to cover up the crime - but prosecutors at the district attorney's office discover that taking the suspect to court could have serious political repercussions

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the murders of two scientists found stabbed to death following a fire. The evidence points to a mentally disturbed woman, but Cutter and Rubirosa suspect she may have been manipulated by someone else

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The chief suspect in the murder of several homeless men appears to be a schizophrenic street performer. Detectives Lupo and Bernard's problems compound when they find evidence suggesting a possible copycat is at work. Jeremy Sisto and Anthony Anderson star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate when a prominent charity executive is murdered - but the case unexpectedly sheds light on a major scandal, leading to a heated confrontation between McCoy and the governor of New York. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterson, Anthony Anderson and Jeremy Sisto

credits.actor: Sam Waterson, Anthony Anderson, Jeremy Sisto

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lupo and Bernard investigate the death of war veteran Greg Tanner, whose body was discovered in a Hudson University car park. Clues lead the duo to law professor Kevin Franklin, a former employee of the Department of Justice, and the picture gets clearer as Franklin's memos from the Bush Administration are leaked as the case goes to court. The first episode in the final season of the crime drama, starring Jeremy Sisto, Anthony Anderson and Sam Waterston

credits.actor: Jeremy Sisto, Anthony Anderson, Sam Waterston

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones

credits.actor: Mark Harmon, Tamer Hassan, Matt L Jones

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Frank steps on a land mine and realises he cannot remove his foot without triggering the device, leaving Horatio and the bomb disposal team facing the delicate task of deactivating it. Meanwhile, Delko breaks up a domestic dispute while off duty - only to become the subject of a lawsuit. Rex Linn and Adam Rodriguez star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Foster parents are accused of murdering a five-year-old in their care, but it seems their son's video game obsession could be the real key to her death - until the victim's biological mother snatches her other daughters from the house. Hard-hitting police drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.sub-title: Racing a Junkyard Porsche - Part One.
programme.desc: Aaron Kaufmann plans to build a `junkyard Porsche' to take on Richard Rawling's 2015 Porsche 911 Turbo S. However, things go awry when the expensive conversion kits do not fit

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: Aaron and the gang aim to finish their junkyard Porsche ahead of their big race against Richard's new $200,000 Porsche Turbo S

programme.title: Overhaulin
programme.desc: Chip Foose and a team of mechanics work on a 1956 Chevrolet Nomad for Jay Leno's friend Dave Killackey

programme.title: Overhaulin
programme.desc: A woman calls in the team to revamp her son's 1967 Charger, which he inherited seven years ago when his father died

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars
programme.desc: Wayne Carini tracks down a Porsche for restoration, but after seeing the elements of an impressive car collection, he may have trouble letting it go

programme.title: Chasing Classic Cars

programme.title: Airplane Repo
programme.desc: Turbulence could spell disaster for Mike Kennedy. A second crack at a $3million Citation V offers Ken Cage and Danny Thompson a shot at redemption

programme.title: A Racing Car Is Born

programme.desc: A 1969 Camaro arrives at Kindig It Design, presenting Dave and the crew with a unique challenge. Plus, the upholstery shop repairs an old convertible top

programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Edd China are asked to restore a powerful, luxury 1983 Mercedes 500 SEC, but face a steady challenge in returning it to its former glory

A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.desc: The start of the Yukon gold mining season nears, but a late spring and plummeting gold prices force miners to battle frozen ground

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: For the first time all season Howie and Adam end up on the same BC wreck, and the old veteran doesn't like how the new guy is running the show

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: An inexperienced driver blocks the mountain overpass, enraging the locals. Thord needs a new truck, and Kristoffer and Erik perform a rush hour rescue

programme.title: Nazi Weird War Two
programme.desc: Robert Joe and Sam Willis explore Heinrich Himmler's Wewelsburg Castle, to discover why he tries to destroy it and the secrets behind the infamous Black Sun room

programme.title: War Heroes of the Skies
programme.desc: The story of George Beurling, the brave pilot who saved the strategically-important island of Malta during the Second World War as told by his comrades(c)

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: The 600km Siegfried Line, considered one of the greatest fortifications in warfare history. The campaign to breach it cost 140,000 American casualties

programme.title: Strippers: Cars for Cash
programme.desc: The teams bargain for an old Ford Transit and an ageing tractor to strip to a shell and sell on as parts for the highest sum of cash possible. Narrated by John Challis (car dealer Boycie in Only Fools and Horses)

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Barry has long harboured hopes of restoring his 1984 Audi UR Quattro. However, his poor health has left him sapped of energy, so Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw step in to offer help

programme.title: Car SOS
programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw restore a neglected classic 1970s car belonging to a doctor whose work has left him too busy to look after it

programme.title: Wicked Tuna
programme.desc: Last season's champion struggles to stay in the lead, while rival crews face circumstances beyond their control and an unlikely challenger enjoys an unprecedented success

programme.title: Yukon Gold
programme.sub-title: In for a Penny, In for a Pound.
programme.desc: The miners take massive risks in their hunt for gold, as Ken invests a large amount of money into his plan, and new miner Carn is worried when his payday is threatened by fire

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: New employees Phil and Wayne face big problems, Al runs into trouble on a steep and twisting road, while Jamie and Adam race to re-open two highways

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjorn improvises to fill an engine with cooling water, while Thord and his new assistant Andrzej come to the aid of a Polish driver who is ill-equipped for the dangerous roads

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Investigators struggle to gain access to the remote site where a Santa Barbara Airlines flight crashed in 2008

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: The errors that caused the deaths of 118 people in the 2001 Linate airport disaster in Milan, when a pilot was forced to rely on ground controllers for take-off

programme.title: Lawless Island: Alaska
programme.desc: Documentary following the people of a remote community as they struggle to acquire food, fuel and shelter. Last in the series(c)

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: North v South
programme.desc: The crews have less than 48 hours to complete their haul, as the season draws towards one of the show's closest ever finishes(c)

programme.title: Mine Kings
programme.desc: The team travels to Madagascar on a quest to find seven sapphires, each a different colour, in just five days - with the gems having to be found in ethically run mines(c)

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.sub-title: Niki Lauda: Tragedy in the Air.
programme.desc: Former racing driver Niki Lauda, the founder of Lauda Air, joins forces with investigators looking into the crash of Lauda Air Flight 004 of May 1991. The deadliest aviation accident involving a Boeing 767 to date, it claimed the lives of 213 passengers and 10 crew members. There had been speculation that a bomb may have destroyed the aircraft, though a design flaw has since been identified that could affect other passenger planes

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Investigating how American Airlines Flight 587 crashed in New York City, killing 265 people just months after the terrorism attacks of September 2001(n)

programme.title: The 90s: The Decade That Connected Us
programme.desc: A cast of actors, eyewitnesses, politicians and celebrity interviewees remember a time when Jerry Springer first hit TV screens in 1991, the Waco siege of religious group the Branch Davidians in 1993, and Black Hawk Down, otherwise known as the battle of Mogadishu, Somalia in October 1993(n)

programme.title: Yukon Gold
programme.desc: Life is tough for the miners as Ken has to choose between paying his crew and his debtors, Big Al is let down by his equipment and Dennis must find $10,000 or face shutdown(n)

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie and his crew retrieve a stolen vehicle that crashed 500ft down into a ravine. Plus, after a tough winter, Adam considers leaving the Alberta operation(n)

programme.title: Miss Fisher's Murder Mysteries
programme.desc: Jack's father-in-law is implicated in the brutal murder of a prostitute, so Phryne perfects her skills as a fan dancer so she can go undercover for information at a notorious gentleman's club. Australian crime drama set in 1920s Melbourne, starring Essie Davis(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Lynley and Havers respond to a call for help from a friend working at a prestigious public school to investigate the disappearance of a promising pupil. Their inquiries are hampered by the establishment's ancient traditions and unwritten rules, but the truth eventually proves more sinister than the detectives could ever have anticipated. Guest starring Bill Nighy, with Nathaniel Parker and Sharon Small(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: As everyone gathers to watch the eclipse at the Ballarat Observatory, a body is found in the commotion, and Blake has to find a suspect in order to prove his own innocence(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: In their first case without trusty colleague Jack, the team members reinvestigate the disappearance of PE teacher Jason Bowe when the remains of a body are discovered near the elite public boarding school where he taught. Unfortunately, their snooping could not have come at a worse time for the staff, who are preparing to welcome a local MP to open their new computer centre - but what they do glean tells them the dead man seemed very much a loner. However, it soon turns out he got on much better with his students, forming close and inappropriate relationships with several. But could his behaviour have rattled someone enough to kill him? Susannah Harker and Nicola Walker guest star(n)

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
programme.desc: The detective investigates after aristocrat Chauncey Beaton is found dead at his stately home, having fallen from a balcony. Bizarrely some of the servants report hearing Beaton shout his half-brother's name just before the incident, but the relative concerned had committed suicide some time earlier. Murdoch must decide whether the man took his own life or was the victim of a murder. Yannick Bisson stars(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: As everyone gathers to watch the eclipse at the Ballarat Observatory, a body is found in the commotion, and Blake has to find a suspect in order to prove his own innocence(n)

programme.title: Dangerfield
programme.sub-title: And Lips That We Might Tell.
programme.desc: Paul is reluctantly drawn into a complicated crash investigation, becoming the target of a disturbed woman who turns up at the surgery baying for blood. Meanwhile, Al prepares for her wedding day - but it seems the dashing doctor may not make it to the church on time. Drama, starring Nigel Le Vaillant, Tamzin Malleson and Tim Vincent(n)

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: A troubled young woman's father is killed three weeks after the death of her mother, leaving the priest to console the bereaved while trying to solve a puzzling murder. Fifties-set crime drama, starring Mark Williams, Sorcha Cusack and Tom Chambers(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Richard Poole meets up with a group of old university friends who have arrived on the island for a reunion, only for tragedy to strike when the man who has solved so many murders becomes the victim. Faced with such a sensitive crime, the commissioner quickly drafts in another British inspector to help the team get to the bottom of the mystery. It soon becomes clear that the newcomer, Humphrey Goodman, is just as eccentric as Poole - but he is also just as bright, and wastes no time questioning the partygoers, all of whom are prime suspects, while pondering the biggest mystery of all - how did the culprit commit the crime in full view of all the other guests? Kris Marshall joins the cast, with Ben Miller, Sara Martins and Danny John-Jules(n)

programme.title: Frankie Drake Mysteries
programme.desc: Frankie and Trudy investigate when the teenage daughter of a preacher disappears, and discover that the girl was not as innocent as her parents believed(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Kris Marshall is back as the British detective working on the Caribbean island of Saint Marie, where the sun shines all day and it seems half the residents are killers-in-waiting. And so it appears with the first case when a plantation owner ends up dead during a seance - although with the door firmly closed at the time and all the participants holding hands round the table, who did the deed? The victim's family are convinced it was the work of a ghost said to haunt the plantation, but Humphrey is determined to find a more rational explanation. Meanwhile, Fidel has moved on, leaving Officer Dwayne Myers holding the fort - and while he is struggling to cope, the last thing he needs is the Commissioner stepping in to help. Crime drama, with guest appearances from Holby City's Don Gilet and former Corrie bad girl Natalie Gumede(n)

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Evelyn advises Charlie to get some minor plastic surgery done in Las Vegas. While he is away, Alan assumes his identity, and secures the attentions of a female admirer at Pavlov's. programme.title: Two and a Half Men

programme.desc: JD and Dr Cox plot against each other, while Carla and Elliot try to sort out their personal and professional problems. Dr Kelso punctures his eardrums, giving everyone in the hospital the chance to say what they really think about him

programme.title: Scrubs
programme.desc: Dr Wen is injured in a car accident and left unable to perform complex surgery. Turk steps into the breach and puts in a brilliant performance that leaves him feeling a little too full of himself. JD learns what the Janitor really thinks of him, and Dr Cox is left fearing old age when he hurts his back

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Paul puts his foot down at home and forbids the girls to invite their boyfriends to the Thanksgiving feast. He also makes friends with his new editor, and they discover they both have reputations as `psycho dads'

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: Paul allows 13-year-old Rory to go on his first date - much to the dismay of Bridget and Kerry, who complain they were not allowed to go out with boys when they were his age. John Ritter and Martin Spanjers star

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel - You Know.
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel finally consummate their relationship, and it seems romance is also on the horizon for Monica - but the object of her affections happens to be old enough to be her father. With guest star Tom Selleck

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out.
programme.desc: Monica's parents are dismayed to discover she is dating their middle-aged friend, and an argument with Chandler prompts Joey to move out of the flat. Matthew Perry and Matt LeBlanc star, with guest appearances by Tom Selleck and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Moves In.
programme.desc: Rachel begins to feel smothered by Ross's constant attention. Meanwhile, Phoebe makes a video for her song Smellycat, and Chandler's new flatmate Eddie causes problems

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Dr Ramoray Dies.
programme.desc: Joey makes unfortunate comments in an interview with a fanzine, threatening his role as Dr Ramoray and casting a shadow over his acting career. Meanwhile, Chandler's new flatmate Eddie becomes increasingly annoying. Comedy, guest starring Tom Selleck, with Matt LeBlanc and Matthew Perry

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go.
programme.desc: Chandler begins to have grave doubts about new flatmate Eddie - just as Joey starts house-hunting. Meanwhile, the girls try to get in touch with their inner selves using a personal empowerment manual for inspiration. Comedy, starring Matt LeBlanc, Jennifer Aniston and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies.
programme.desc: Monica's boyfriend makes a good impression on Chandler and Joey. Phoebe gets a shock while watching a film and Rachel begins to resent Ross planning their future. US comedy, starring Courteney Cox, David Schwimmer and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr work behind the counter of a famous New York City deli and head to Union Square, where they break the ice with bizarre behaviour while selling ice lollies

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The guys pose as blackjack dealers at a Connecticut casino, play another hint-and-guess game at the park, and go head-to-head acting as shoeshiners

programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break.
programme.desc: A harassed Rachel tells Ross she thinks they should take a break from each other - so he responds by getting drunk and sleeping with a woman Joey and Chandler have been chasing. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tries to prevent Rachel discovering he slept with Chloe from the photocopying shop, but she finds out anyway and a major argument ensues at her apartment. Trapped in Monica's bedroom, the other friends cannot help overhearing everything

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Without the Ski Trip.
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel's separation begins to cause friction among the pals, who feel they have to choose between the estranged pair - and an impending skiing holiday only makes matters worse. Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer star

programme.sub-title: The One with the Hypnosis Tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey meets Miss Right, and Rachel is dismayed to learn her boss has started dating Chandler. Meanwhile, Monica inherits a doll's house, filling Phoebe with jealousy

programme.title: FatChanceofWork:TooFatforLove
programme.desc: Looking for love can be hard at the best of times, but for the obese it can even tougher. This documentary follows three supersize singletons on the lookout for like-minded and like-bodied people. Eddie weighs more than 25 stone and rarely leaves the house, except for his weekly trip to bingo. Thirty-stone Stavros has tried all the dating sites but cannot find anyone to match his larger-than-life personality. Sam has never had a boyfriend, putting it down to lack of confidence. Cameras follow all three as they go out on two dates each - will any of them find love at last?(c)
